883330.name: The Skeleton
883330.description:
The Skeleton is a Survival Horror Game in which you must survive for as long as you can until the timer runs out. Your enemy is a Skeleton who came from the grave and wants to kill you. The game comes with a Story Mode, Survival Maps, and Challenging Game Modes that will scare you.

Key Features:

Survival Maps: Survive for as long as you can until the timer runs out and avoid The Skeleton for as long as you can.

Game Modes: Much like the survival maps except there are Game Modes that are challenging and scarier than the original survival maps.

Spooky Atmosphere: The game brings a spooky atmosphere and adds tension to the player cause you never know when the enemy can come out of the shadows and strike you at the right moment.

Dark Game Worlds: Some of the game world in the game are dark and creepy and give off a very unpleasant feeling knowing that someone may be watching you.

Secret Maps: There are 3 secret maps in the game that can give you the creeps.
883330.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
